components.logOutHeader: Do you want to log out of your account?
components.logOutQuestion: Your account will be closed, and you will need to enter the password again.

courts.bookingError: It is not possible to proceed with your reservation, please check the dates and ensure you have not booked on that day previously.
courts.bookingSuccess: Your reservation has been saved successfully. Enjoy your game.
courts.invalidBookMsgError1: Your urbanization has not yet enabled the use of this application for booking.
courts.invalidBookMsgError2: You have received the letter and successfully created an account, let's give other users time to register.
courts.invalidBookMsgError3: Refer to the received letter for more information about the date when the system comes into effect.
courts.confirmBookQuestion: Are you sure you want to book?
courts.forgetBookTime: Don't forget to select the booking time

community.deleteAskConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your reservation?
community.deleteErrorBooking: It is not possible to delete a booking for a past court.

profile.surePassEmailChange: Do you want to proceed with the email and password change?
profile.sureEmailChange: Do you want to proceed with the email change?
profile.surePassChange: Do you want to proceed with the password change?
profile.successOnEdit: Your data has been successfully modified.
profile.errorOnEdit: It is not possible to modify your email or password, please try again later.

create.notPossibleGeneric: It is not possible to create your account, please use another email or try again later. We apologize for the inconvenience.
create.notPossiblePass: It is not possible to create your account, please verify that the password matches in both cases.

forget.errorMsgNoMail: This email does not exist for password restoration, please check that it is correctly written.
forget.successMsg: Password successfully reset, check your email for the new password.

numberCreate.errorMsg: This code does not exist, please try again with a valid one. We apologize for the inconvenience.

noConnection.genericError: It seems there are network issues, please check your internet connection.
